Key Match Events: Jake Meyers singled off James McArthur (5-6) with one out in the ninth
Jose Altuve hit a game-ending RBI double in the ninth to send Meyers home
Paul DeJong sent a slider from Josh Hader (7-7) into the Crawford Boxes in left field to tie it
Post-Match Reflections: He always finds a way to wow us and that’s another big swing by Jose Altuve, manager Joe Espada said.
That curveball, the sinker kept that all-righty lineup off-balance, Espada said. His stuff is so good. Efficient, composed, going after hitters, getting big outs.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Framber Valdez threw a no-hitter against Cleveland on Aug. 1, 2023
Valdez nearly had a second no-hitter earlier this month
Bobby Witt Jr. reached on an error by shortstop Jeremy Peña to start the ninth
Michael Massey grounded out to left field for the Royals' first hit
Royals' first baseman Vinnie Pasquantino will miss the rest of the regular season after breaking his right thumb
